src/lib/components/DashSeqviz.react.js.description:
ExampleComponent is an example component.
It takes a property, `label`, and
displays it.
It renders an input with the property `value`
which is editable by the user.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

className.description: Extra CSS classes to apply to the wrapper <div>. (e.g., "mb-3")

style.description: Inline styles for the wrapper <div>. Must include a height for SeqViz to render.

seq.description: Nucleotide sequence (string). Provide uppercase A/C/G/T/U/N etc.

viewer.description: Viewer mode: linear, circular, both, or both_flip.

annotations.description:
Feature annotations to render on the sequence.
[{start:number, end:number, name?:string, direction?:1|-1|0, color?:string, id?:string|number, type?:string}]

primers.description:
Primer objects to render.
[{start:number, end:number, name?:string, direction?:1|-1|0, sequence?:string, tm?:number}]

translations.description:
Translation tracks / ORFs to render.
[{start:number, end:number, name?:string, frame?:0|1|2|-1|-2|-3, direction?:1|-1|0, aa?:string}]

enzymes.description: Restriction enzymes to show. Either names ["EcoRI", ...] or detailed objects.

highlights.description:
Highlighted ranges on the sequence.
[{start:number, end:number, color?:string, underline?:boolean, opacity?:number, label?:string}]

zoom.description: Initial zoom window for the linear viewer: {start?:number, end?:number}.

selection.description:
Current selection returned to Dash callbacks.
{start:number, end:number, clockwise?:boolean}

setProps.description: Dash-injected callback to report prop changes back to Dash.

onSelection.description: Optional JS-only selection handler when using this component in pure React.
